column5: This Luxury boutique style condominium is the epitome of European Style Elegance sitting in Uptown Dallas. It is not only a place to stay, but also a place full of opportunities to feel the city pulse. Equipped with brand new appliances, the place is a few minutes away from Katy Trail, fantastic restaurants, and the hottest bars in town!
column8: Uptown Dallas Luxury European 1 Bed Condo
